loans.name: Nilea Ana

texts.es:
La señora Nilea es socia del Banco Comunal “Primero de Agosto” de distrito de Zepita, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno; tiene 25 años de edad, de estado civil casada, tiene 02 hijos, vive en la comunidad de Izani, ella estudio educación secundaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 2 años, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ganado porcino.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 3000.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar gaseosas al por mayor, también vende ganado ovino luego de mejorarlo.

Su mayor deseo es comprarse una casa en Tacna.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros.
texts.en:
Sra. Nilea is a member of the Communal Bank “Primero de Agosto” (First of August), which is located in the District of Zepita, Chucuito Province, Department of Puno. She is 25 years old, married, and has 2 children. Nilea lives in the community of Izani and completed her high school education.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos for 2 years. Her first loan of 300 soles enabled her to increase her business capital for buying and selling pigs. At the moment, she is requesting a new loan of 3000 soles to purchase sodas at wholesale.

After her business improves, she also plans to sell sheep. Nilea’s greatest wish is to purchase a house in Tacna. She enjoys her savings.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase sodas

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es:
La señora Lucia es socia del Banco Comunal “Primero de Agosto” de distrito de Zepita, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno; tiene 42 años de edad, estado civil casada, tiene 02 hijos, vive en el Barrio Porteño, ella estudio educación superior completa (bellas artes).

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 2 años, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de carne.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 2500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar degollados de cordero el cual vende en su puesto del mercado.

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando y sacar adelante a sus hijos.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros, y los encuentros.
texts.en:
Sra. Lucia is a member of the Communal Bank “Primero de Agosto” (First of August), which is located in the District of Zepita, Chucuito Province, Department of Puno. She is 42 years old, married, and has 2 children. Lucia lives in the Porteño neighborhood and completed her college education in fine arts.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos for 2 years. Her first loan of 300 soles provided additional capital for her meat business. Lucia is now requesting a new loan of 2500 soles to purchase slaughtered lambs to sell from her market stall.

Her greatest hope is to continue working so that her children can get ahead. Lucia enjoys her savings and the Communal Bank meetings.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase lambs

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
La señora Rosa Maria es socia del Banco Comunal “Primero de Agosto” de distrito de Zepita, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno; tiene 35 años de edad, estado civil casada, tiene 04 hijos, vive en el Jr. 28 de Julio 107, ella estudio educación secundaria incompleta (3er grado).

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 2 años, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de chifles.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 2500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ají, para venderlo en las ferias de la zona, al mismo tiempo vende ganado.

Su mayor deseo es seguir trabajando para poder darles una educación a sus hijos.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros, y las facilidades en los préstamos.
texts.en:
Sra. Rosa Maria is a member of the Communal Bank “Primero de Agosto” (First of August), which is located in the District of Zepita, Chucuito Province, Department of Puno. She is 35 years old, married, and has 4 children. Rosa lives in Jr. 28 de Julio 107 and has a third grade education.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos for 2 years. Her initial loan of 300 soles increased her business capital for buying and selling banana chips. Rosa Maria is currently requesting a new loan of 2500 soles to purchase chili peppers that she will sell at the regional fairs. At the same, she plans to sell livestock.

Her greatest hope is to continue working so that she can provide her children with a good education. Rosa Maria enjoys her savings and the simplicity of her loans.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase chili peppers

loans.name: Hilda Vilma

texts.es:
La señora Hilda es socia del Banco Comunal “Primero de Agosto” de distrito de Zepita, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno; tiene 42 años de edad, estado civil casada, tiene 03 hijos, vive en la comunidad de San Sebastián, ella estudio educación primaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 2 años, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de gaseosa.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar gaseosas al por mayor, la señora también se dedica a la cría de ganado para engorde.

Su mayor deseo es darles una educación a sus hijos.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros, y las reuniones

loans.use: Para la compra de gaseosas.

loans.name: Catalina

texts.es:
La señora Catalina es socia del Banco Comunal “Primero de Agosto” de distrito de Zepita, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno; tiene 37 años de edad, estado civil casada, tiene 04 hijos, vive en el centro poblado de Tasupa, ella estudio educación primaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 2 años, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ganado ovino.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ganado ovino para engorde, la señora también se ayuda con sus chacras.

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros,  las reuniones y las charlas
texts.en:
Mrs. Catalina is a member of the "Primero de Agosto" (First of August) communal bank in the Zepita distict, in the province of Chucuito, in the department of Puno. She is 37 years old, is married, and has 4 children. She lives in the Tasupa village. She completed primary school. Mrs. Catalina has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for 2 years. Her original loan was for 300.00 Nuevos Soles, which allowed her to increase the capital of her sheep buying and selling business. Now she needs a new loan of 500.00 Nuevos soles, which will allow her to purchase sheep for fattening. Mrs. Catalina also helps with her small farm. Her greatest desire is to continue working. She likes savings, meetings and chats.

Translated from Spanish by Heather Nicholson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase sheep.

loans.name: Nhoem

texts.en: Nhoem S. is a 24-year-old widow woman and mother (she appears in the photo). She has three school-aged kids and they live together in a small wooden house. Nhoem S. owns a stall behind her house where she raises many pigs to earn a living. She also raises her pig for both purposes, for their babies and slaughtering. She normally needs to raise at least over six months before selling out. Nhoem S. is applying for a loan in order to build a proper place where she will use to distill wine and she will use the leftover of wine to provide for her family’s pig eating.

loans.use: To build a place where she will use to distill wine

loans.name: Leticia

texts.en:
Leticia P. is from Barangay Bantay Solana, Cagayan. She is married to Jimmy, who used to operate a passenger jeep. Farming is their major source of income. They are blessed with three school-aged children.

Leticia sells different kinds of vegetables, fruits and some food snacks. She hopes to continue expanding her vending business.  Since she doesn't have enough capital, Leticia is seeking financial assistance from KIVA lenders for PHP5, 000.  She plans to buy several kilos of vegetables and fruits for her vending business, such as squash, tomatoes, eggplants, pechay, and carrots.

However, vegetable prices are now triple their original prices because of the two recent typhoons. She is praying that her business will somehow overcome such calamities so her family will not suffer from hunger.

loans.use: for additional capital for her vending business

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es:
La señora Mercedes es socia del Banco Comunal “Primero de Agosto” de distrito de Zepita, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno; tiene 35 años de edad, estado civil soltera, tiene 02 hijos, vive en la Av. Panamericana s/n, ella estudio educación primaria incompleta (3er grado).

La señora inicia su  trabajo con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos con un préstamo inicial fue de S/. 500.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de chifles, nos cuanta que va a comprar, detergentes, artículos de ferretería, betunes, cepillos, papel higiénico, etc ella comercializa sus productos en las ferias semanales.

Su mayor deseo es poder poner una tienda y  darles una educación a sus hijos.

A ella le  gustan las facilidades en el préstamo
texts.en:
Mercedes is a member of the "Primero de Agosto" Community Bank from the District of Zepita, Province of Chucuito, Region of Puno. She is 35 years old, is single, and has two children. She lives on the street Av. Panamericana s/n. She has a third grade education. Mercedes is starting her work with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos with an initial loan of S/. 500.00 Nuevos Soles, which will allow her to increase her retail business' capital. She sells chifles (fried plantain chips), detergents, hardware supplies, shoe polish, brushes, toilet paper, etc. She sells her products during the weekly markets. Her biggest desire is to be able to open a store and provide her children with an education. She likes the terms of the loan.

Translated from Spanish by Colleen Godfrey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: For the purchase of hardware, shoe polish, brushes, toilet paper, etc.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
La señora Rosa es socia del Banco Comunal “Rió Desaguadero” del distrito D. Desaguadero, Provincia D. Chucuito, Departamento D. Puno; tiene 58 años D. edad, estado civil casada, tiene 05 hijos, vive en la comunidad D. Carique, estudio educación primaria incompleta (2do grado).

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace casi un año, su préstamo inicial fue D. S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio D. compra venta D. detergentes.

En la actualidad requiere D. un nuevo préstamo D. S/. 500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar detergentes al por mayor en la feria D. Desaguadero y lo venD. en la misma feria por unidad.

Su deseo es continuar trabajando.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros y las facilidades en los préstamos.

loans.use: Para la compra de detergentes.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La señora Francisca es socia del Banco Comunal “Rió Desaguadero” del distrito de Desaguadero, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno; tiene 52 años de edad, estado civil conviviente, tiene 05 hijos, vive en el jr. Puno 458, estudio educación primaria incompleta (4to grado).

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 8 años, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ropa.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 2500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ropa para vender en la feria semanal.

Su deseo es continuar trabajando y convertirse en mayorista.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros y las facilidades en los préstamos
texts.en:
Francisca is a member of the communal bank called Rio Desaguadero, in the Chucuito province of Puno. She is 52 years old and lives with her husband and their 5 children. Francisca was only able to complete her primary education until the fourth grade. She has been working with the organization Manuela Ramos for the last 8 years. Her first loan enabled her to grow her business buying and selling clothing. She will use the new loan to purchase more clothing to sell at the weekly market. She would like to continue growing her business and eventually become a wholesaler.

Translated from Spanish by Emily Charnes, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase more clothing which she sells at the weekly market

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida S. has been engaged in the direct sale of personal products for three years and five years in the sale of Avon cosmetics. She is married to Rolando S. who is 53 years old; his major source of income comes from his farming. They are gifted with three children who are now adults, some of whom are working in Manila. Her employed children give her a little support if there is an emergency or a need for financial assistance.

Nida is requesting a loan of 19,000 PHP for additional capital so she can purchase more inventory. Presently, she hasn’t enough capital to fill her customers’ orders. She earns 25 percent of the retail price on every product that she sells. Her commissions serve as her source of income for herfamily.

loans.use: For additional capital to purchase more inventory

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
La señora Rosa es socia del Banco Comunal “Rió Desaguado” del distrito de Desaguadero, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno; tiene 45 años de edad, estado civil soltera, tiene 01 hijo, vive en el jr. Odria s/n, estudio educación secundaria incompleta (2do grado).

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace varios años no recuerda, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ropa.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 3000.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ropa al por mayor, ella lo vende al por menor en las ferias semanales, también se dedica a la venta de productos de la región.

Su deseo es convertirse en mayorista y ser distribuidora.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros y las reuniones.
texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the communal bank Rio Desaguado in the province of Chucuito in Puno. She is 45 years old and has one son. Rosa was not able to complete her secondary education. She has been working with the organization Manuela Ramos for several years. She used the first loan to start her business buying and selling clothing. She needs the new loan to purchase more clothing which she buys wholesale, and then sells in the weekly markets. She also sells various products typical of the region. She would like to become a wholesaler and distributor as her business grows. She likes the meetings of the communal bank, as well as the savings she is able to put aside.

Translated from Spanish by Emily Charnes, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase clothing wholesale, which she then sells in the weekly markets

loans.name: Delia

texts.es:
La señora Delia es socia del Banco Comunal “Rió Desaguado” del distrito de Desaguadero, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno; tiene 25 años de edad, estado civil conviviente, tiene 01 hijo, vive en el jr. Puno s/n, estudio educación secundaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace varios años no recuerda, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de verduras.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar papa, y verduras así como zanahorias, cebollas, zapallos, apio, etc para venderlo en el mercado de Desaguadero..

Su deseo es convertirse en mayorista y surtir mejor su mercadería.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros y las reuniones

loans.use: Para la compra de papa, y verduras así como zanahorias, cebollas, zapallos, apio, etc

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn E. is already 37 years old. She lives in Barangay Bantay Solana, Cagayan. She is married to Romulo who is a local farmer in their community. They are blessed with three children and they are Maica - 14 years old, a sophomore high school student; Marco - nine years old, a presently a grade II pupil; Francisco E. Jr. - four years old. According to Marilyn, her family has a good bonding and live happily in their simple village. 

Marilyn is running a village store business for almost 14 years now. She works hard and gets up early in the morning to prepare for her store to operate. She buys different goods in the market twice a week. She is requesting to borrow loan from KIVA lenders the amount of PHP5, 000. She believes that this amount will enable her to buy more grocery items to retail. She hopes this will help her attain a better living standard for her family.

loans.use: additional capital for purchasing more items for her store

loans.name: Ty

texts.en: Ty T., 46, is a widowed farmer who lives with her two children. Living in the Takeo province, she typically makes US$1 every day and is aided by her daughter who works in a garment factory. The Takeo area has not seen favorable weather conditions for farming this past year. Along with increased inflation, it has been a difficult year economically in much of Cambodia. As a farmer, Ty T. is taking a lot of the brunt of the economic downturn. That is why she has approached CREDIT with a request for a loan. Ty T. is asking for a loan of US$300 to purchase fertilizer and a motorbike for her daughter to commute to work, a purchase that she sees as a good opportunity to increase her income.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer and a motorbike.

loans.name: Yut

texts.en: Yut S. is an older village woman and a widow - her husband died of senility years ago. She currently lives with a daughter, as her two other children are married and have already started new family homes. To earn a living, Yut S. cultivates a rice crop and has been farming since 1979, while her daughter sells a few grocery items for a profit. In the past, Yut S. hired a farmer’s cow to help plow her farmland. She hopes to reduce her farm expenses by using a Kiva loan to buy a pair of cows for plowing. With the remainder of the loan she will support her daughter’s grocery business. She and her daughter are pictured.

loans.use: To buy a pair of cows for plowing

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda A. is from Dalipuga, Iligan City. She is 56, married and has 7 adult children. To make a living, she owns & operates a business selling a variety of vegetable products. She has had this business for over 4 years and earns approximately 5,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2009, Erlinda joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. She is requesting her first loan, for 5000 PHP,  which she will use to purchase additional products to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business. 

About HSPFI:
 
HSPFI is one of accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

location.town: Suarez, Iligan City, Lanao del Norte

loans.name: Reyna

texts.es:
La señora Reina es socia del Banco Comunal “Rió Desaguado” del distrito de Desaguadero, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno; tiene 41 años de edad, estado civil conviviente, tiene 02 hijos, vive en el jr. Leticia s/n, estudio educación primaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 9 años, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de gaseosa.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar productos de la región como papa, chuño, quinua, etc, además gaseosas para venderlos en las ferias semanales.

Su deseo es hacer crecer su negocio y aumentar su capital.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros y las reuniones.

loans.use: Para la compra de papa, chuño, quinua, etc,

loans.name: Hermelinda

texts.es:
Hermelinda tiene 59 años, vive con sus 4 hijos en su casa propia. Cuenta con 34 años de experiencia en las actividades agrícolas y ganaderas, principalmente siembra papa y maíz, y los animales que compra los vende en la feria ganadera de su localidad. La compra y venta de sus animales le permite tener ingresos mientras espera la cosecha de sus productos, de los cuales una parte vende y otra es para su consumo. Ambas actividades son muy ventajosas para Hermelinda, quien no toma en cuenta el arduo trabajo, pues seguirá realizando estas actividades hasta cuando tenga vitalidad. 

Este es su 12avo crédito con MFP, ella es parte de un banco comunal donde es muy estimada por ser una mujer muy perseverante y responsable. El dinero que ahora solicita lo utilizará en la compra de ganado ovino para posteriormente venderlos a mayor precio.
texts.en:
Hermelinda is 59 years old and lives with her 4 children in her own house. She has 34 years of experience in agriculture and livestock, primarily potatoes and corn, as well as animals she buys at her local markets. The purchase and sale of the animals enables her to generate income while she waits to harvest the corn and potatoes, some of which she sells and some of which she and her family consume. Both of these activities are very advantageous for Hermelinda. She doesn't mind the hard work, and will continue in her efforts as long as she is strong enough to do so.

This is Hermelinda's 12th loan with MFP. She is a well respected member of the communal bank, where she is known as a very responsible and persistent woman. She will use the new loan to purchase livestock, which she will be able to sell later at a better price.


Translated from Spanish by Emily Charnes, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase livestock for her business

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
La señora Martha es socia del Banco Comunal “Rió Desaguado” del distrito de Desaguadero, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno; tiene 26 años de edad, estado civil casada, tiene 01 hijo, vive en el jr. Chucuito s/n, estudio educación primaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace varios años no recuerda, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ropa.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 2000.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar buzos de deporte, a su vez que también elaborara artesanías como chompas, accesorios por pedido.

Su deseo es continuar trabajando.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros.
texts.en:
Sra. Martha is a member of the Communal Bank “Rió Desaguado” which is located in the District of Desaguadero, Chucuito Province, Department of Puno. She is 26 years old, married, and has 1 child. Martha lives in Jr. Chucuito s/n and completed her elementary school education.

She has been working with Manuela Ramos for several years, but she does not remember exactly how many. Her first loan of 300 soles provided additional capital for her clothing business. Martha is now requesting a loan of 2000 soles to buy sportswear. She also produces handmade sweaters and accessories upon request.

Martha hopes to continue working and she enjoys her savings.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase sportswear

loans.name: Raquel

texts.es:
Raquel tiene 32 años, vive con su hijo de 4 años, en casa de sus padres. Ella se ha dedicado a la agricultura desde niña, sus padres le enseñaron a cultivar la tierra que hoy es su principal fuente de ingresos. Todos los días, Raquel se esfuerza por lograr mejoras en su casa, por lo que ayuda bastante a sus padres y también tiene sus propias extensiones de terreno donde siembra papa y el maíz. Para ella es un gran apoyo que su familia participe de la cosecha y la siembra de sus productos y siempre estará muy agradecida. 

Una vez recolectada, Raquel comercializa su cosecha, al por mayor, en el mercado de su zona y su deseo es tener más extensiones de terreno para seguir adelante con su actividad.

Este es su 7mo crédito con MFP, ella es parte de un banco comunal y siempre está pendiente del  progreso de su  grupo. El dinero que viene solicitando será invertido en la compra de sacos de abono y semilla para su próxima campaña de siembra.
texts.en:
Raquel is 32 years old. She lives with her 4 year old son in her parents’ house. She has been involved in farming since childhood. Her parents taught her how to cultivate the land, which is now her main source of income. Every day, Raquel strives to make improvements to her home with some assistance from her parents. She also has her own tracts of land where she grows potatoes and corn.

Raquel is grateful that she has the support of her family, who help her with planting and harvesting her crops. During the harvest season, Raquel sells her produce at the local wholesale market. She hopes to acquire additional tracts of land so that she can continue to succeed in farming.

This is Raquel’s 7th loan with MFP. As a member of her Communal Bank, she always participates in moving her group forward. The money she requested will be used to purchase sacks of fertilizer and seeds for the next planting season.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase fertilizers & seeds

loans.name: Yem

texts.en:
Yem S. is 20 years old and resides in the Takeo province with her husband, Nes sophara. Since 2006, she has been selling animal food to earn a living and is able to make approximately US$3 of profit every day. Her husband is an animal doctor and makes US$3 per day as well. 

Yem S. is asking for a loan of US$1000 to make a new investment. She would like to take out this loan to purchase animal food and raise chickens for sale.

loans.use: Raise chickens and purchase animal food.

loans.name: Rebeca

texts.es:
Rebeca tiene 42 años, vive  con su esposo y sus 7 hijos  en su casa propia. Hace 17 años decidió dedicarse a las tareas agrícolas de manera exclusiva y uno de sus cultivos es la alfalfa, la cual vende a las personas que crían animales en su zona, pero también le sirve para alimentar a sus propios animales. Los fines de semana es cuando compra y vende su ganado y esto significa ganancias adicionales a la venta de su alfalfa. Para el futuro, Rebeca quiere intensificar sus actividades, tener más extensiones de terrenos cultivables y más cabezas de ganado.

Este es su 11avo crédito con MFP, ella es parte de un banco comunal y es una de las socias más perseverantes y quien está pendiente del progreso de su grupo. El dinero que ahora solicita lo utilizará en la compra de sacos de abono para su próxima siembra.

loans.use: Compra de abono

loans.name: Emiliana

texts.es:
La señora Emiliana es socia del Banco Comunal “Señor D. Locumba” del distrito D. Yunguyo, Provincia D. Yunguyo, Departamento D. Puno; tiene 38 años D. edad, estado civil casada, tiene 03 hijos, vive en la comunidad D. Chinumani, ella no tuvo la oportunidad D. seguir estudios.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace varios años es una D. las socias fundadoras, inicio su préstamo con la suma D. S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio D. compra venta D. detergentes.

En la actualidad requiere D. un nuevo préstamo D. S/. 500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar diferentes tipos D. detergentes y para comercializarlos en las ferias semanales.

Su mayor deseo es poder comprarse una casita.

A ella le  gustan  las reuniones y las facilidades en los préstamos
texts.en:
Sra. Emiliana is a member of the Communal Bank “Señor D. Locumba”, which is located in the District of Yunguyo, Yunguyo Province, Department of Puno. She is 38 years old, married, and has 3 children. She lives in the community of Chinumani and was not able to continue her studies.

Emiliana has been working with Manuela Ramos for several years since she is one her group’s founding members. Her first loan was in the amount of 300 soles and was used to increase her operating capital for her detergent business.

She is now requesting a new loan of 500 soles so that she can buy different types of detergents that she will sell at the fairs on a weekly basis. Emiliana hopes to buy a house of her own. She enjoys her Communal Bank meetings and the simplicity of her loans.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase detergents

loans.name: Segundina

texts.en:
Segundina B. is from Suarez, Iligan City. She is 56 years old. Segundina is widowed and has three school-aged children. To make a living, Segundina owns & operates a business selling snacks & other delicacies in the local community. Segundina has been engaged in her business for over five years and earns approximately 3,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2009, Segundina joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Segundina is requesting a loan of 5000 PHP, which will be used to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale. This loan will be the first loan taken out by Segundina from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business. 

About HSPFI:

HSPFI is one of accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase raw ingredients

location.town: Suarez, Iligan City, Lanao del Norte

loans.name: Catalina

texts.es:
La señora Catalina es socia del Banco Comunal “Señor D. Locumba” del distrito D. Yunguyo, Provincia D. Yunguyo, Departamento D. Puno; tiene 46 años D. edad, estado civil casada, tiene 05 hijos, vive en la comunidad D. Chinumani, ella no tuvo la oportunidad D. seguir estudios.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace varios años es una D. las socias fundadoras, inicio su préstamo con la suma D. S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio D. compra venta D. detergentes.

En la actualidad requiere D. un nuevo préstamo D. S/. 1000.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar diferentes tipos D. detergentes, los cuales los venD. en la feria zonal, además la señora se dedica a su chacra.

Su mayor deseo es hacer crecer su capital para poner una tienda al por mayor.

A ella le  gustan  las reuniones y las facilidades en los préstamos.
texts.en:
Sra. Catalina is a member of the Communal Bank “Señor D. Locumba”, which is located in the District of Yunguyo, Yunguyo Province, Department of Puno. She is 46 years old, married, and has 5 children. She lives in the community of Chinumani and was not able to continue her studies.

Catalina has been working with Manuela Ramos for several years since she is one her group’s founding members. Her first loan was in the amount of 300 soles and was used to increase her operating capital for her detergent business. She is now requesting a new loan of 1000 soles so that she can buy different types of detergents that she will sell at the regional fair. In addition, Catalina engages in farming.

Her greatest wish is to increase her capital so that she can open a wholesale outlet. She enjoys her Communal Bank meetings and the simplicity of her loans.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase detergents

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en:
Corazon is engaged in the tailoring business in her village. It is her way of making a living since she got married. Corazon wants to further improve her business to provide for the basic needs of her family. She is borrowing a loan of PHP5,000 to have capital to purchase materials needed for her tailoring business. With this amount, she will be able to purchase a sufficient supply of needles, threads, and fabric. She hopes that for the second time, her loan will be granted.


Corazon is a 60-year-old businesswoman. She is married to Rogelio who does farming in their village. The couple is blessed with six adult children. Corazon, together with her husband and her two grandchildren, live peacefully in the village of San Vicente, Quirino, Isabela.

loans.use: To purchase needles, thread and fabric

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Hem

texts.en: Hem T. is 31 years old and lives with her husband and two young children in the Takeo province. She is able to make about US$3 each day as a garment factory worker. Her husband is a worker in printing shop. He typically makes US$3 every day as well. Hem T. would like to take out a loan of US$1000 her husband needs to purchase a motorbike to commute to work.

loans.use: To purchase a motorbike.

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es:
La señora Angélica es socia del Banco Comunal “Señor de Locumba” del distrito de Yunguyo, Provincia de Yunguyo, Departamento de Puno; tiene 25 años de edad, estado civil casada, tiene 01 hijo, vive en el Barrio Santa Bárbara, ella pudo estudiar secundaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 3 años, inicio su préstamo con la suma de 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de abarrotes.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 3000.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ropa importada, para venderlo en las ferias zonales.

Su mayor deseo es poder educar a su hijo.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros y las reuniones

loans.use: Para la compra de ropa importada.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
La señora Margarita es socia del Banco Comunal “Señor D. Locumba” del distrito D. Yunguyo, Provincia D. Yunguyo, Departamento D. Puno; tiene 57 años D. edad, estado civil casada, tiene 04 hijos, vive en la comunidad D. Tanapaca, ella pudo seguir estudios superiores incompletos.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos mas D. 2 años, inicio su préstamo con la suma D. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio D. compra venta D. artesanías.

En la actualidad requiere D. un nuevo préstamo D. S/. 2000.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar bisutería y cosméticos por pedido.

Su mayor deseo es poner una tienda D. venta D. cosméticos.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros y las facilidades en los préstamos
texts.en:
Sra. Margarita is a member of the Communal Bank “Señor D. Locumba”, which is located in the District of Yunguyo, Yunguyo Province, Department of Puno. She is 57 years old, married, and has 4 children. Margarita lives in the community of Tanapaca. She was able to pursue a higher education, but did not finish.

Margarita has been working with Manuela Ramos for more than 2 years. Her first loan in the amount of 300 soles provided additional capital for her handicraft business. She is now requesting a new loan of 2000 soles to purchase costume jewelry and cosmetics that she will sell by order.

Margarita hopes to open a cosmetics store. She enjoys her savings and the simplicity of her loans.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase cosmetics & costume jewelry

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Buying clothes

loans.name: Vaon

texts.en: Vaon V., 40, is married to Nhan Voeun, (pictured) age 51. Vaon V. is a local chef; she is also hired by people to cook food for their wedding parties. She usually earns an average US$3 a day to be managed all her family’s daily living needs, as another source of family income come from her husband, who sells rice husks that he buys from hulling machine. This couple is the good parents of five children; two of whom live separately and other three are dependent on their income. Vaon V. said that she also faces the transportation problem because she doesn’t have a vehicle for driving needs and she hopes to have a motorbike but she is not adequate money to buy one. Therefore, she is looking for contributors on Kiva through HKL to be used to purchase a motorcycle.

loans.use: To purchase a motorcycle

loans.name: Shindy

texts.en:
Shindy B. is from Santiago, Iligan City. She is 24 years old. Shindy is married and has two infant children. To make a living, Shindy owns & operates a business selling scrap metal & other used-products in the local community. Shindy earns approximately 5,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2009, Shindy joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Shindy is requesting a loan of 8000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. This loan will be the 2nd loan taken out by Shindy from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business. 

About HSPFI:

HSPFI is one of accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase additional products to sell

location.town: Santiago, Iligan City, Lanao del Norte

loans.name: Segundina

texts.es:
Segundina tiene 59 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. Tiene 32 años de experiencia en la ganadería y en la agricultura, con estas labores, junto con su esposo, sacaron adelante a sus hijos que ahora son mayores de edad. Pero Segundina se sigue dedicando a sus cultivos, pues aun tiene dos menores hijos a quienes solventarles los estudios.  Los animales que cría son vacas, ovejas y pollos, ella misma acondicionó su granja en un espacio de su casa, y es con la venta de estos animales con los que solventa los gastos de su hogar hasta que llegue la época de cosecha.

Esta es la quinta oportunidad en que  tiene un crédito con MFP, ella es parte de un banco comunal y está muy comprometida con el pago puntual de sus cuotas. El dinero que solicita será invertido en la compra de sacos de abono para su próxima campaña de siembra.
texts.en:
Segundina is 59 years old, and lives with her husband and two of their children in their own home. She has 32 years of experience in cattle raising and agriculture, thanks to which, she and her husband raised and educated their older sons. Segundina continues planting, however, as she still has two young sons to put through school. Segundina raises cows, sheep, and chickens. She herself started her farm in a plot near her home. She uses what she earns selling animals to sustain her family until harvest time. This is Segundina's fifth loan with Kiva partner MFP. She belongs to a community bank and she is committed to paying her installments on time. The loan she is requesting today will be invested in fertilizer for the next planting season.

Translated from Spanish by Violeta Rubiani, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying fertilizer

loans.name: Sofia Esperanza

texts.es:
La señora Esperanza es socia del Banco Comunal “Señor de Locumba” del distrito de Yunguyo, Provincia de Yunguyo, Departamento de Puno; tiene 33 años de edad, estado civil soltera, tiene 02 hijos, vive en el Jr. Grau 797, ella  estudio educación primaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace mas de 1 años, inicio su préstamo con la suma de 500.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de zapatillas.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 2000.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar zapatillas al por mayor para venderlo en las ferias semanales.

Su mayor deseo es poder comprarse una casa.

A ella le  gusta la puntualidad y las y las facilidades en los préstamos.

loans.use: Para la compra de zapatillas

loans.name: Meas

texts.en: Meas S., 57, lives in Takeo province with his wife. To earn a living, he works collecting palm juice to refine into palm sugar. With this business, he is able to make US$1.80 per day. His wife, Kim Net, 49, raises animals and makes US$1 every day. This couple have four children, two are in school and two are garment factories workers. Meas S. would like to take out a loan of US$700 to purchase a motorbike for one of her children to operate a moto-taxi service.

loans.use: To purchase and operate a moto-taxi.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La señora Juana es socia del Banco Comunal “Señor de Locumba” del distrito de Yunguyo, Provincia de Yunguyo, Departamento de Puno; tiene 37 años de edad, estado civil conviviente, tiene 04 hijos, vive en el Barrio Casani, ella  tuvo la oportunidad de seguir estudios de educación secundaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace medio año, inicio su préstamo con la suma de 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ovinos.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ganado ovino para engorde, ella luego los venderá en las ferias de la zona.

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando.

A ella le  gustan  las reuniones y los ahorros.
texts.en:
Juana is a member of the communal bank “Señor de Locumba” located in Yunguyo District, Yunguyo Province, Department of Puno; she is 37 years old, lives with her partner, and has four children. She lives in the Casani neighborhood and has had the opportunity to complete her high school studies. Juana has been working with Kiva partner Movimiento Manuela Ramos for six months. Her first loan was for PEN 300, which allowed her to increase her capital for her business buying and selling sheep. Today, she is requesting a new loan of PEN 1,000, which will allow her to buy more sheep to fatten and resell at the local markets. Juana's biggest wish is to keep working. She loves going to loan center meetings and to save.

Translated from Spanish by Violeta Rubiani, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying sheep

loans.name: Chhal

texts.en: Chhal T., 23, is married and lives with her young child in Takeo province. She is a farmer who works for less than US$1 each day, while her husband works in construction making US$5 each day. The weather conditions have been difficult for farming in Cambodia this past year and inflation has caused food prices to skyrocket. These factors have played into a difficult economic year for many Cambodians, Chhal T. included. In light of these economic difficulties, she is asking for a loan of US$800 she needs to purchase a motorbike for her husband to commute to work.

loans.use: To purchase a motorbike.

loans.name: Yany Beatriz

texts.es:
La señora Jenny es socia del Banco Comunal “Señor de Locumba” del distrito de Yunguyo, Provincia de Yunguyo, Departamento de Puno; tiene 19 años de edad, estado civil conviviente, tiene 01 hijo, vive en el Barrio Casani, ella  tuvo la oportunidad de seguir estudios de educación secundaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace medio año, inicio su préstamo con la suma de 500.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de corderos.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 800.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ganado ovino para engorde, la señora Yeni vende los corderos luego de mejorarlos en las ferias zonales.

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando y educar a su hijo.

A ella le  gustan  las reuniones, los ahorros y las charlas.

loans.use: Para la compra de ganado ovino.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn B. is from Pala-o Market, Iligan City. She is 44 years old. Jocelyn is single. To make a living, Jocelyn owns & operates a business vending a variety of fruits. Jocelyn has been engaged in her business for over seven years and earns approximately 5,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2009, Jocelyn joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Jocelyn is requesting a loan of 5000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. This loan will be the first loan taken out by Jocelyn from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business. 

About HSPFI:

HSPFI is one of accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase additional products to sell

location.town: Pala-o Market, Iligan City, Lanao del Norte

loans.name: Sao

texts.en:
Sao M., 43, is a professional decorator of women’s clothes who lives in Takeo province. Since 2005, she has been using beads and other materials to make flower designs on women’s clothes to earn a living and typically makes US$2.50 each day. Sao’s husband is a construction worker building houses and makes US$5 per day.

Decorated dresses are a kind of Khmer traditional dress and women wear them during Water Festival, P’chum Ben or Khmer New Year. It takes around 7 to 10 days to complete each dress and so they are expensive but most of the people prefer hand made over machine made. She said she learned how to decorate from her mother and she has been doing this business since before she was married.

Sao M. would like a loan of US$1,000 to purchase beads, cloth and other materials to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase beads, cloth and other materials

loans.name: Phin

texts.en: Phin P., 51, is married and resides with her husband in the Takeo province. She makes cow bells and also works as a farmer who is able to make for less than US$1 per day, while her husband is a blacksmith. He typically makes US$2 every day. Phin P. is asking for a loan of US$1000 to make two investments. First, she would put some money to reinvest in her husband business and the rest is used to purchase materials to make cow bells.

loans.use: Make cow bells.

loans.name: Luz

texts.es:
Luz, de 36 años, es una mujer que a lo largo de su vida ha trabajado mucho por salir adelante, vive en su propia casa y lo que más desea es tener un buen futuro. En el mercado Las Mercedes (mercado importante de la ciudad de Juliaca), se encuentra el puesto de venta de frutas de Luz, junto a su carretilla sale todas las mañanas a vender sus deliciosos productos, los cuales son rápidamente comprados, ya que ella tiene la fama de vender fruta muy fresca y limpia.

Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo, es que en el momento que siente hambre se pude comer una fruta para satisfacerse, lleva 5 años realizando este trabajo y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer toda la mañana y parte de la tarde bajo el caliente sol, lo cual hace que se canse más rápido. Para el futuro, desea seguir trabajando duro hasta que pueda juntar el dinero suficiente para poner la tienda de abarrotes que tanto desea.

Este es el octavo préstamo de Luz con MFP, está muy segura de poder pagar sus cuotas a tiempo, ya que sabe que cualquier retraso que tenga puede causarle problemas a su banco comunal, donde es muy querida por el resto de sus compañeras. Los dos mil quinientos nuevos soles solicitados los invertirá en comprar más fruta y aumentar la cantidad de mercadería que tiene, también separará parte del dinero para hacer arreglar su triciclo.

loans.use: Incremento de mercadería

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
La señora Alicia es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazón Pampuyo” del centro poblado de Corazón Pampuyo del distrito de Pomata, Provincia de Chucuito, Departamento de Puno; tiene 26 años de edad, estado civil conviviente, tiene 02 hijos, vive en la plaza de Ticaraya, ella estudio educación superior (computación).

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 1 años y medio, inicio su préstamo con la suma de 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ganado ovino.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 800.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ganado ovino para engorde, luego lo vende en la feria de Chaca Chaca, también se dedica a la cría de ganado porcino para engorde.

Su mayor deseo es poner una tienda de venta de abarrotes.

A ella le  gustan  las reuniones, los ahorros y las charlas.

loans.use: Para la compra de ovinos.

loans.name: Rosito

texts.en:
Rosito B. is from Brgy. Puga-an, Iligan City. He is 44 years old. Rosito is married and has three school-aged children. To make a living, Rosito owns & operates a business selling seafood products, including fish and shrimp, in the local community. Rosito has been engaged in his business for over 20 years and earns approximately 6,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2009, Rosito joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Rosito is requesting a loan of 5000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. This loan will be the first loan taken out by Rosito from HSPFI. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand his business. 

About HSPFI:

HSPFI is one of accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase additional products to sell

location.town: Puga-an, Iligan City, Lanao del Norte

loans.name: Vianney

texts.es:
La señora Vianney es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazón Pampuyo” ubicado en el centro poblado de Corazón Pampuyo del distrito Pomata, Provincia de Chucuito y departamento de Puno; tiene 32 años de edad, estado civil casada, tiene 03 hijos, vive en el Barrio Santa Rosa, ella estudio educación primaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 5 años, inicio su préstamo con la suma de 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ganado ovino.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ganado ovino para engorde, la señora también se dedica a la cría de ganado mayor.

Su mayor deseo es hacer crecer su negocio y aumentar su capital.

A ella le  gustan  las reuniones, los ahorros y las charlas.
texts.en:
Ms. Vianney is a member of the Community Bank “Corazón Pampuyo” located in the population center of Corazón Pampuyo in the district of Pomata, Province of Chucuito and department of Puno. She is 32 years old. She is in a civil marriage and has three children. She lives in Ticaraya. She didn’t have the opportunity to follow her studies. She has worked with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for five years. She began her loan with the amount of $100 (300 PEN), which allowed her to increase her capital for her business of buying and selling sheep. Now, she requires a new loan of $375 (1000 PEN), which will allow her to buy sheep to fatten. She also raises large livestock. Her biggest desire is to grow her business and increase her capital. She likes meetings, savings, and lectures.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Trad, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy sheep

loans.name: Vai

texts.en: Vai Y., 65 years old, lives with her family members in Battambang province in Cambodia. Her husband, Yeng Chhoun, is 67 years of age and they have five married and one single child. Their single child sells cooking ingredients to earn a living. Presently, the couple earns a living by growing rice on their half hectare of land that they inherited from their parents, and they currently earn an average of $2 per day. Vai Y. has asked for a loan of US$700 for her child’s grocery business. She proposes to use the rest of the loan for her farming business.

loans.use: For her child's grocery business.

loans.name: Eusevia

texts.es:
La señora Eusevia es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazón Pampuyo” ubicado en el centro poblado de Corazón Pampuyo del distrito Pomata, Provincia de Chucuito y departamento de Puno; tiene 40 años de edad, estado civil casada, tiene 05 hijos, vive en Ticaraya, ella no tuvo la oportunidad de seguir estudios.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 2 años, inicio su préstamo con la suma de 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ganado ovino.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 200.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ganado ovino para engorde, la señora también se dedica a la cría de aves de corral.

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando para incrementar su capital y así poder educar a sus hijos.

A ella le  gustan  las reuniones y las charlas.
texts.en:
Ms. Eusevia is a member of the Community Bank “Corazón Pampuyo” located in the population center of Corazón Pampuyo in the district of Pomata, Province of Chucuito and department of Puno. She is 40 years old. She’s in a civil marriage and has five children. She lives in Ticaraya. She didn’t have the opportunity to follow a scholastic path. Ms. Eusevia has been working with el Movimiento Manuela Ramos for two years. She began her loan with the amount of $100 (300 PEN), which allowed her to increase her capital for her business of buying and selling sheep. Now, she requires a new loan of $75 (200 PEN), which will allow her to buy sheep to fatten. She will also raise poultry. Her biggest desire is to continue working to increase her capital and as such be able to educate her children. She enjoys meetings and lectures.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Trad, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy sheep and poultry

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.es:
La señora Cecilia es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazón Pampuyo” ubicado en el centro poblado de Corazón Pampuyo del distrito Pomata, Provincia de Chucuito y departamento de Puno; tiene 40 años de edad, estado civil casada, tiene 06 hijos, vive en Ticaraya, ella estudio educación primaria incompleta (2do grado).

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 3 años, inicio su préstamo con la suma de 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ganado porcino.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 2500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ganado vacuno para engorde, luego lo vende en las ferias zonales,

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando y agrandar su negocio.

A ella le  gustan  las reuniones y los ahorros.
texts.en:
Ms. Cecilia is a member of the Community Bank “Corazón Pampuyo” located in the population center of Corazón Pampuyo in the district of Pomata, Province of Chucuito and department of Puno. She is 40 years old. She’s in a civil marriage and has six children. She lives in Ticaraya. She did not complete her primary education (2nd grade). She has been working with el Movimiento Manuela Ramos for three years. She began her loan with the amount of $100 (300 PEN), which allowed her to increase her capital for her business of buying and selling pigs. Now, she requires a new loan of $900 (2500 PEN), which will allow her to buy cattle to fatten. Later she will sell them at markets in her area. Her biggest desire is to continue working and increase her business. She enjoys meetings and savings.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Trad, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Hilaria

texts.es:
La señora Hilaria es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazón Pampuyo” ubicado en el centro poblado de Corazón Pampuyo del distrito Pomata, Provincia de Chucuito y departamento de Puno; tiene 33 años de edad, estado civil casada, tiene 03 hijos, vive en Ticaraya, ella estudio educación secundaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 3 años, inicio su préstamo con la suma de 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ganado porcino.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ganado vacuno para engorde, luego lo vende en la feria de Chaca Chaca, también se dedica a la chacra.

Su mayor deseo es poder comprarse su casita en Yunguyo.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros ya las charlas.
texts.en:
Ms. Hilaria is a member of the community bank “Corazón Pampuyo” located in the population center of Corazón Pampuyo in the district Pomato, providence of Chucito and the department of Puno. She is 33 years old. She’s married in a civil marriage. She has three children. She lives in Ticaraya. She completed her secondary education. She has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for three years. She began her loan with the amount of $100 (300 PEN), which allowed her to increase her capital for her business of buying and selling pigs. Now, she requires a new loan of $550 (1500 PEN), which will allow her to buy cattle to fatten, later she will sell it in the market of Chaca Chaca. She also farms. Her biggest desire is to be able to buy herself a little house in Yunguyo. She likes savings and lectures.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Trad, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Maryjane

texts.en:
"Plant today and tomorrow you will reap.” This is the guiding principle of Maryjane of Barangay Parog Parog Solana, province of Cagayan. She is married and has three children. Princess Camille Faye, 10, is a grade 5 pupil. Krista Mae, 9, is a grade 3 pupil. Reanna Marie Angelca is 2 years old. Despite the hardships in life, they work hard to support the needs of their children in order to have a better future to raise their own family.

Farming is their main source of income. They plant rice and vegetables on their farm twice a year. In addition, Maryjane manages her hog raising business for additional source of income. 

Maryjane wants to borrow PHP 28,000.00 to use as additional capital for their farm. She will use the loan for her crops and also for the maintenance of their hog raising business. She is glad that she can earn a net income of PHP 25,000 during harvest season and an additional Php3,000 in her hog raising business. They budget her income for daily basic needs of their children, and for the payment of her loan amortizations.

loans.use: Additional capital for her farming business

loans.name: Dionicia

texts.es:
La señora Dionisia es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazón Pampuyo” ubicado en el centro poblado de Corazón Pampuyo del distrito Pomata, Provincia de Chucuito y departamento de Puno; tiene 38 años de edad, estado civil casada, tiene 06 hijos, vive en Ticaraya, ella estudio educación primaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 5 años, inicio su préstamo con la suma de 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ropa.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ropa en todas las tallas, además se dedica también a la cría de ovinos y aves de corral.

Su mayor deseo es poder tener una granja.

A ella le  gustan  las reuniones, los ahorros y las charlas.

loans.use: Para la compra de ropas de todas las tallas y aves de corral.

loans.name: Teodosia

texts.es:
La señora Teodocia es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazón Pampuyo” ubicado en el centro poblado D. Corazón Pampuyo del distrito Pomata, Provincia D. Chucuito y departamento D. Puno; tiene 60 años D. edad, estado civil V., tiene 06 hijos todos casados, vive en Ticaraya, ella no pudo seguir estudios.

La señora inicia su  trabajo con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos y su préstamo es D. S/. 500.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio D. D. aves D. corral, las cuales las venD. en las ferias semanales.

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando.

A ella le  gustan  las facilidades en el préstamo.

loans.use: Para la compra de aves de corral

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
La señora Rosa es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazón Pampuyo” ubicado en el centro poblado D. Corazón Pampuyo del distrito Pomata, Provincia D. Chucuito y departamento D. Puno; tiene 60 años D. edad, estado civil casada, no tiene hijos, vive en Ticaraya, ella no tuvo la oportunidad D. seguir estudios.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 2 años, inicio su préstamo con la suma D. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio D. compra venta D. ganado ovino.

En la actualidad requiere D. un nuevo préstamo D. S/. 500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ganado ovino para engorD., los cuales los venderá en las ferias semanales..

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando.

A ella le  gustan  las reuniones y los ahorros
texts.en:
Ms. Rosa is a member of the Community Bank “Corazón Pampuyo” located in the population center of Corazón Pampuyo in the district of Pomata, Province of Chucuito and department of Puno. She is 60 years old. She is in a civil marriage. She doesn’t have children. She lives in Ticaraya. She didn’t have the opportunity to follow her studies. She has worked with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for two years. She began her loan with the amount of $100 (300 PEN), which allowed her to increase her capital for her business of buying and selling sheep. Now, she requires a new loan of $200 (500 PEN), which will allow her to buy sheep to fatten. She will sell them at weekly markets. Her biggest desire is to continue working. She likes meetings and savings.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Trad, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy sheep

loans.name: Hong

texts.en: S. is 26 and her husband’s name is Mr. Chenda, age 29. S. and her family reside in Battambang province, in Cambodia, where she owns a small grocery business in her home. She sells some items to her villagers and passers-by across the road in front of her shop. Besides the grocery business, she and her husband also do farming work in the village. S. was married years and has given birth to a lovely young child, who is enrolled in the primary school. S. is busy selling her items everyday and never wastes time. Recently, her inventory has been exhausted; she wants to resupply and is looking for a $500 loan. She will use half of her loan to purchase more groceries for sale and the rest to buy an ox to support her in the farm work. (S. was not available at that day, so her husband is shown instead in the picture).

loans.use: To purchase more groceries for sale and to buy an ox to support her in the farm work

loans.name: Nicolasa

texts.es:
La señora Nicolasa es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazón Pampuyo” ubicado en el centro poblado de Corazón Pampuyo del distrito Pomata, Provincia de Chucuito y departamento de Puno; tiene 50 años de edad, estado civil casada, tiene 04 hijos, vive en Ticaraya, ella  pudo estudiar educación primaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 3 años, inicio su préstamo con la suma de 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ropa.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 3000.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar ganado ovino para engorde, para comercializarlo en las ferias zonales.

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando.

A ella le  gustan  las reuniones y los ahorros

loans.use: Para ganado ovino

loans.name: Guillermina

texts.es:
La señora Guillermina es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazón Pampuyo” ubicado en el centro poblado de Corazón Pampuyo del distrito Pomata, Provincia de Chucuito y departamento de Puno tiene 35 años de edad,  estado civil casada, tiene 04 hijos, vive en Ticaraya, ella estudio educación primaria completa.

La señora inicia su trabajo con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos con un préstamo  de  S/. 500.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ganado ovino y porcino.

Su mayor deseo es agrandar su capital para poder poner un negocio grande.

A ella le  gustan las facilidades en los prestamos.
texts.en:
Ms. Guillermina is a member of the Community Bank “Corazón Pampuyo” located in the population center of Corazón Pampuyo in the district of Pomata, Province of Chucuito and department of Puno. She is 35 years old. She is in a civil marriage and has four children. She lives in Ticaraya. She didn’t have the opportunity to follow her studies. She began her loan with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos with the amount of $200 (500 PEN), which allowed her to increase her capital for her business of buying and selling sheep and pigs. Her biggest desire is to increase her capital to be able to create a large business. She likes the ease of the loans.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Trad, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy sheep

loans.name: Martina

texts.es:
La señora Martina es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazón Pampuyo” ubicado en el centro poblado de Corazón Pampuyo del distrito Pomata, Provincia de Chucuito y departamento de Puno; tiene 39 años de edad, estado civil casada, tiene 03 hijos, vive en Ticaraya, ella estudio educación primaria incompleta (3ro de primaria).

La señora inicia su trabajo con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos con un préstamo  de  S/. 500.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ganado ovino para engorde pasados los 3 meses lo vende en las ferias zonales.

Su mayor deseo es educar a sus hijos.

A ella le  gustan  las facilidades del préstamo.
texts.en:
Mrs. Martina is a member of the community bank "Corazón Pampuyo” located in the town of Corazón Pampuyo in the Pomata District, Province Chucuito, and Department of Puno. She is thirty-nine years old, married, and has three children. She lives in Ticaraya. She never completed her primary education, only reaching the third year. She begins her work with Movimiento Manuela Ramos with a loan of 500 soles, which will allower her to increase capital for her business buying and selling sheep. After fattening them for three months, she sells them at regional fairs. Her biggest desire is to educate her children. She likes the ease of loans.

Translated from Spanish by Lydia Brantley, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying sheep

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es:
La señora Rosario es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazón Pampuyo” ubicado en el centro poblado de Corazón Pampuyo del distrito Pomata, Provincia de Chucuito y departamento de Puno; tiene 21 años de edad, estado civil conviviente, tiene 02 hijos, vive en Ticaraya, ella estudio educación secundaria incompleta (2 do grado.

La señora inicia su trabajo con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos con un préstamo inicial de  S/. 500.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ganado ovino para engorde.

Su mayor deseo es poder darles una profesión a sus hijos.

A ella le  el trato y las facilidades en los pagos.
texts.en:
Sra. Rosario is a member of the Communal Bank “Corazón Pampuyo”, which is located in the central village of Corazón Pampuyo in Pomata District, Chucuito Province, Department of Puno. She is 21 years old, in a common law marriage, and has 2 children. Rosario lives in Ticaraya and has a 2nd grade education.

She just started working with Manuela Ramos. Her first loan is in the amount of 500 soles and will be used to increase her business capital so that she can buy sheep for fattening. Rosario hopes to give her children the opportunity to pursue a profession. She enjoys the treatment she has received and the ease of her payments.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase sheep for fattening

loans.name: Emiliana

texts.es:
La señora Emiliana es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazón Pampuyo” ubicado en el centro poblado de Corazón Pampuyo del distrito Pomata, Provincia de Chucuito y departamento de Puno; tiene 34 años de edad, estado civil casada, tiene 04 hijos, vive en Ticaraya, ella estudio educación secundaria completa.

La señora inicia su trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos con un préstamo inicial de  S/. 500.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ganado ovino y aves de corral comercializa sus productos en las ferias de la zona.

Su mayor deseo es poner una tienda de abarrotes.

A ella le  gustan  las facilidades de los prestamos.
texts.en:
Sr. Emiliana is a member of the Communal Bank “Corazón Pampuyo”, which is located in the central village of Corazón Pampuyo in Pomata District, Chucuito Province, Department of Puno. She is 34 years old, married, and has 4 children. Emiliana lives in Ticaraya and completed her high school education.

She just started working with Manuela Ramos. Her first loan is in the amount of 500 soles and will be used to increase her business capital so that she can buy pigs and chickens to sell at the regional fairs. Emiliana hopes to open a grocery store. She enjoys the simplicity of her loan.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase pigs & chickens

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
La señora Julia es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazón Pampuyo” ubicado en el centro poblado de Corazón Pampuyo del distrito Pomata, Provincia de Chucuito y departamento de Puno; tiene 49 años de edad, estado civil casada, tiene 04 hijos, vive en Ticaraya, ella estudio educación primaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 7 años, inicio su préstamo con la suma de S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de productos de la región.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 3000.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar papas, chuño, ocas, habas, quinua, etc. De acuerdo a la temporada, luego los comercializa en las ferias semanales.

Su mayor deseo es agrandar su capital.

A ella le  gustan  las reuniones y los ahorros

loans.use: Para la compra de papas, chuño, ocas, habas, quinua, etc

loans.name: Hilaria

texts.es:
La señora Hilaria es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazón Pampuyo” ubicado en el centro poblado de Corazón Pampuyo del distrito Pomata, Provincia de Chucuito y departamento de Puno; tiene 38 años de edad, estado civil casada, tiene 02 hijos, vive en Ticaraya, ella estudio educación primaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 7 años, inicio su préstamo con la suma de S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de ganado menor.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 3000.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá comprar gaseosa al por mayor para venderlo en las ferias, también se dedica a la cría de ganado vacuno.

Su mayor deseo es poder educar a sus hijos.

A ella le  gustan  las reuniones y las charlas.
texts.en:
Hilaria is a member of the Community Group "Corazón Pampuyo" ('The Heart of Pampuyo'), located in the centre of Pampuyo, in the district of Pomata, in the province of Chicuito - which is in the department of Puno. Hilaria is 38 years old and she is married with two kids. She lives in Ticaraya and has been educated to primary school level.

She has been working with the Manuela Ramos movement for 7 years, and she started with a loan of 300 soles, which allowed her to increase her business' capital through the buying of livestock in bulk.

She currently requires a new loan of 3000 soles, which will allow her to buy fizzy drinks in bulk in order to sell them in markets. She also raises cattle.

Her greatest desire is to be able to educate her kids.

She enjoys the group's meetings and talks.


Translated from Spanish by Liz Harvey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy fizzy drinks/Para la compra de gaseosas.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.es:
La señora Sabina es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazón Pampuyo” ubicado en el centro poblado de Corazón Pampuyo del distrito Pomata, Provincia de Chucuito y departamento de Puno; tiene 43 años de edad, estado civil casada, tiene 03 hijos, vive en Ticaraya, ella estudio educación primaria completa.

La señora viene trabajando con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 7 años, inicio su préstamo con la suma de S/. 300.00 Nuevos Soles, el cual le permitió incrementar su capital para su negocio de compra venta de abarrotes.

En la actualidad requiere de un nuevo préstamo de S/. 1500.00 Nuevos soles, el cual le permitirá aumentar a su capital para la compra de ganado vacuno para engorde y luego comercializarlo en las ferias de la zona.

Su mayor deseo es continuar trabajando.

A ella le  gustan  los ahorros y las charlas.
texts.en:
Sabina is a member of the Community Group "Corazón Pampuyo", which is located in the centre of Corazón Pampuyo, in the district of Pomata. This is in the province of Chicuito, in the department of Puno. She is 43 years old and is married with 3 kids. She lives in Ticaraya and has been educated to primary school level.

Sabina has been working with the Manuela Ramos movement for 7 years, and she began with a loan of 300 soles which allowed her to increase her business' (the buying and selling of groceries) capital.

She currently requires a new loan of 1500 soles, which will allow her to increase her capital in order to buy cattle to feed and then sell in the local markets.

Her greatest desire is to continue to work.

She enjoys the group's talks and savings.


Translated from Spanish by Liz Harvey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy cattle/Para la compra de gando vancuno.

loans.name: Vai

texts.en: Mr. Vai D. is 28 years of age and currently lives in the province of Battambang, Cambodia. He is a married man and father of two school-aged kids. While his wife (she appears in photo) stays at home to sell a variety items for income. She sells like vegetables, pork, fruits, chicken, and other cooking ingredient for villagers. Vai D. owns a small pumping machine which he uses to pump sand from River to sell for a profit. Unfortunately, his machine often has broken down during the pumping process. To solve the problem, Vai D. requests a loan of US$1000 which he will use for repairing his broken machine and use the rest of the loan to help increase the capital of his wife’s business.

loans.use: For repairing his broken machine and use the rest of the loan to help increase the capital of his wife’s business

loans.name: Nasur

texts.ru: Насур Джураев проживает в Яванском районе. Возраст 34 года. Женат, имеет 3 детей. Насур вместе с женой занимается пашивкой. Помимо этого Насур работает шофером на заводе. Он занимается перевозкой муки, а дома на машинке шьет мешки для них. Жена также занимается пашивкой, она в основном шьет одежду. Кредит просит для покупки новой машинки, чтобы увеличить производство и ассортимент продукта. На полученную прибыль хочет отремонтировать свой дом.
texts.en:
Nasur J. resides in the Yovon region. He is 34 years old, married, and has three children. Nasur and his wife run a sewing business. In addition, he works as a driver for a factory, transporting flour. At home he sews bags for the flour. His wife also sews, generally making clothing. He is requesting a loan for a new sewing machine in order to increase production and the variety of products. With the profits they will earn, he wants to make home repairs.

Translated from Russian by Joyce ., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of a sewing machine

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Angelita

texts.en:
Angelita B. is from the village of P-2, Tag-ibo, Iligan City. She is 38 years old. Angelita is married and has two school-aged children. To make a living, Angelita owns & operates a sari-sari (variety) shop selling products in the local community like basic needs items, snacks and others. Angelita has been engaged in her business for over five years and earns approximately 2,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2009, Angelita joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Angelita is requesting a loan of 5000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. This loan will be the first loan taken out by Angelita from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to support the education of her children. 

About HSPFI:

HSPFI is one of accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase additional products to sell

location.town: P-2, Tag-ibo, Iligan City, Lanao del Norte

loans.name: Mrs. Yum Un Village Bank Group

texts.en:
